name: Daruino
description:
This little game was made for the 6th Discord Libgdx Gamejam.

Gamejam rules was :

  • Theme : Energy
  • Less than a week
  • Use Libgdx game framework

Source code available on GitHub

Build an electronic card to avoid power supply overload. Each component has its own effects : 

  • Some make you more money
  • Some slowdown electrons
  • Some reduce electrons energy

Take care! Electrons tend to take shortest path through the circuit avoiding components.

Warning : This is a Pseudo simulator. Real physic laws are not implemented. Never try to reproduce it at home!!
